snippet: “Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day” includes Steve Carell and Jennifer Garner in its adaptation of Judith Viorst’s children’s book.
abstract: A O Scott reviews movie Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day, directed by Miguel Arteta and starring Steve Carell and Jennifer Garner.
lead_paragraph: “Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day” includes Steve Carell and Jennifer Garner in its adaptation of Judith Viorst’s children’s book.
